pr_title: Updated: simulator api endpoints implemented in /api/v1/projects enpoint
pr_body:
Fixes #3778 

#### Describe the changes you have made in this PR -
Added new api endpoints:

1. check_edit_access:
GET `/api/v1/projects/:id/check_edit_access`
- checks edit access of a user for the specified project id
- if access is granted user Info is returned
- if user does not have access 403 returned
- if user is not signed in 401 is returned
 
2. circuit_data:
`GET /api/v1/projects/:id/circuit_data`
- returns the project's circuit data if available & user has view access to project
- return 403 if user does not have view access of project

3. update_circuit:
`PATCH /api/v1/projects/update_circuit`
- update circuit data if user has edit access
- return 403 if user does not have edit access
- return 401 if user is not signed in 

4. create:
`POST /api/v1/projects`
- create new project if user is singed in
- return 401 if user is not signed in

pr_title: Updated: simulator api endpoints implemented in /api/v1/projects enpoint
pr_body:
Fixes #3778 

#### Describe the changes you have made in this PR -
Added new api endpoints:

1. check_edit_access:
GET `/api/v1/projects/:id/check_edit_access`
- checks edit access of a user for the specified project id
- if access is granted user Info is returned
- if user does not have access 403 returned
- if user is not signed in 401 is returned
 
2. circuit_data:
`GET /api/v1/projects/:id/circuit_data`
- returns the project's circuit data if available & user has view access to project
- return 403 if user does not have view access of project

3. update_circuit:
`PATCH /api/v1/projects/update_circuit`
- update circuit data if user has edit access
- return 403 if user does not have edit access
- return 401 if user is not signed in 

4. create:
`POST /api/v1/projects`
- create new project if user is singed in
- return 401 if user is not signed in

#### Describe the changes you have made in this PR -

1. vite.config.ts: 
    add proxy for requests and set default port 4000

2. router/index.ts:
    add route to handle edit mode of vue simulator as 'simulatorvue/edit/:project_id'

3. globalVariables.ts:
    add: window.isUserLoggedIn & window.isUserLoggedIn

4. authStore.ts:
    add : isLoggedIn: false,
          userId: '',
          username: '',
          locale: 'en',
          isAdmin: false,

5. SimulatorState/state.ts:
    add: i. types for state 
        ii. active circuit object
       iii. dialogbox.delete_circuit

6. USER_DATA.json:
    add: route link to handle options such as dashboard, notification, sign_out etc

7. DropDown.vue:
    add: attributes handling (used for adding links form the json files like above file) and types

8. messageBox.vue:
    add: types

9. Navbar.vue:
    add: get project name from projectStore instead of DOM manipulation
    remove: passing if user is signed in to user.vue

10. User.vue:
    add: i. types for passed in props from navbar.vue 
        ii. directly get isUserLoggedIn and username from the authStore and display accordingly
    
    // note: one comment marked with your username please look and let me know what was actual idea to implement userShowing
    // discuss: about the same on next meet

11. ModuleProperty.vue: 
    fix: wrong import name

12. projectProperty.vue:
    add:  i. types
         ii. bind project name with projectStore using v-model
 ***    iii. messageBox to handle circuit deletion fixes the delete tab error
 ***     iv. Tab switching name change handling with vue's watch instead of setInterval

    TODO: add type to scopeList and fix clock timer and clock enable and lite mode (crashing with continuous resetup() calls)


13. TabsBar.vue:
    add:  i. types
         ii. fix tabs name error occurring due to fetching circuit data form the api and loading the tabs
    
    TODO: add types for scopelist and fix key issue with draggable

14. simulator.vue:
    convert: form options api to composition api

15. simulatorHandler:
    add: handle different states of the simulator such as:
        i. sowing loading screen till simulator is setup
        ii. showing no access for no access projects in edit mode 
        iii. opening simulator in edit / blank simulator mode 

16. projectNameSet.vue:
    add: messageBox for showing popup to enter project project name when project name is 'Untitled'

17. ProjectNameSetHelper.ts:
    add: all the functions required for handling the projectNameSet.vue

    Note: in future would be converted into default components to handle all the prompt() currently being used in the simulator

18. data.spec.js:
    update: update logixProjctId global var name

19. circuit.js:
    add: project name change to be also updated on store (helped in fixing tabs issue) for activeCircuit and circuit_list

20. setup.js:
    fix: simulator setup 
    update: i. use new api/v1 api for fetching project data
           ii. convert ajax calls to fetch api

21. load.js:
    update: tab reordering instead of using DOM use pinia store for the same
    fix: last focussed tab switching

22. save.js:
    fix: i. tabs not updating in the sent updated circuit data with the vue simulator
        ii. project update issue with api
    update: i. use vue store to handle project name instead of DOM
           ii. Remove ajax for fetch api
          iii. use new api/v1 format api to update project

    DONE: update the new project creation api with the whole method
      update: i. Replace forms with json data to create new project 
                  ii. on successful project creation edit project details with new updateProjectDeail.vue component  
      
      
23. SetDetailsOnCreate.vue: --> renamed to --> updateProjectDetail.vue
    DONE: handle the updating of the project after creation of new project staying in the simulator
    
    
### New Additions / changes:

24. DeleteCircuit.vue:
    add: independent component to handle circuit deletion
    
25. PromptComponent.vue:
    add: independent component to replace all prompts currently being used in the simulator

26. Helper.vue
    add: handle all the helper components like DeleteCircuit, PromptComponent and any required functions

### New Additions / changes (part 2):

27. ConfirmComponent.vue
    add: replace confirm() and alert() with this component

28. UpdateProjectDetail.vue
    add: after creating a new component update its details form the browser (in future can be used for quick project details updating from browser and would be useful for desktop application)

29. TextEditor.vue
    add: Simple editor made using tiptap for the updateProjectDetail.vue component

### Screenshots of the changes (If any) -

N/A

Note: Please check **Allow edits from maintainers.** if you would like us to assist in the PR.
